'''''Amon Hen'' 16''' is the sixteenth issue of the [[Amon Hen (journal)|''Amon Hen'' journal]] by [[The Tolkien Society]].

*Feedback on the Feedback
*Tolkien and Recovery

**By: Pat Moynehan
*Summermoot '75
*Other Tolkien-related magazines
*Amon Hen Quiz No. 3 - Answers
*Martin Meyler sends a poem in Quenya
*Any suggestions? Win a Pint!
*Notes on the Manuscripts of LoTR (I missed it!)
